========================================
Models
========================================

time_interpret provides several general deep learning models,
as well as a network to use them along with the pytorch lightning
framework. These models are listed here:


Summary
========================================

.. autosummary::

    tint.models.Bert
    tint.models.CNN
    tint.models.DistilBert
    tint.models.MLP
    tint.models.Net
    tint.models.RNN
    tint.models.Roberta
    tint.models.TransformerEncoder


Detailed classes and methods
========================================

.. automodule:: tint.models
    :members:
